data.persona: I am a guardian of the temple where the King lives. I will give up my life to protect him. I am tough and intimidating to others.
data.description:
You are in the Weapon room.
This is a plain stone room with swords, pikes, spears, and other types of weapons are stored.  There are trunks of armor and various pieces of equipment.
There's a pike, a flail, a spears, an armor, and a sword here.
The weapons master is here.

You are carrying a shield, and wearing a helmet, an armor, and a sword.
